reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little propagation station ticks all the boxes. The color/staining of the stand is lovely, it's easy to assemble, and sturdy once it is. The little vases are an ideal size and very clear; no bubbles, etc. in the glass.Want to root a heavier or taller cutting that makes the vase tip? Simply move the rubber washers on each side so they're snug against the vase and—viola!—no more tipping.While the vase neck is too narrow for my usual glass washing brush, it's easy to clean with a folded sponge or a bottle brush. I like the foam ones; they're like a bristle bottle brush and a sponge had a baby.Lastly... Terrarium? Not even close, XXXFLOWER Store. ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars charming glass suspended cutting starter
reviews.reviewText: I got this for a Christmas gift for my daughter. It came disassembled in a nice pink box, well packaged. I chose to assemble it for her as a gift, but it would be very hard to try to wrap!It is a bit delicate, but with a little care this could be a nice addition to her kitchen counter for many years. Assembly was a piece of cake!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If you want to add a little style and green to your home this terrarium is a perfect start. I bought it as a project for my son to put together and he loved it, finished it in about 10 minutes and then we found the correct plants to put inside the bulbs. It looks so pretty on the bookshelf and just add another touch of life to our home. I am so glad we purchased this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Design, but Fragile and Poor Packaging
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the FLOWER Plant Terrarium with Wooden Stand, Air Planter Bulb Glass Vase Metal Swivel Hold, and while its appearance is undeniably beautiful, I have some concerns about its durability and packaging.On the positive side, this terrarium adds an elegant touch to my living room. The combination of the wooden stand, air planter bulb glass vase, and metal swivel hold creates a visually appealing display that catches the eye. It brings a sense of sophistication to any space and has received compliments from visitors.However, I was disappointed to find that the glass vase arrived cracked. It seems that the packaging was insufficient to protect the delicate glass during shipping. This was a letdown, as I expected better attention to detail when it comes to packaging fragile items.Moreover, the overall sturdiness of the terrarium is questionable. It feels fragile and delicate, raising concerns about its long-term durability. It's important to handle it with utmost care to avoid any accidental damage.In conclusion, while the FLOWER Plant Terrarium with Wooden Stand, Air Planter Bulb Glass Vase Metal Swivel Hold has an appealing design, its fragility and poor packaging leave much to be desired. I would recommend the manufacturer to improve the packaging to ensure safe delivery and consider reinforcing the product's structure. If you decide to purchase it, be prepared to handle it delicately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: What’s there not to like! Easy to put together, sturdy, and very pretty! Will definitely be ordering again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So pretty on my bookcase
reviews.reviewText: I bought 5 of these for my closest friends, not sure what I was getting. I was shocked at the quality of this little planter! So cute with some dirt and a little succulent (I used fake since it’s dead of winter). This would be cute inside your home or out on a porch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reminds me of Mom
reviews.reviewText: Mom could make anything grow. She had a singular hanging vase that hung in her kitchen window. In transporting it to my home, the glass root holder broke. Imagine my happiness when I came across this multiple rooter. It now sits in my kitchen casement window like Mom had hers hanging in her kitchen window. Here’s hoping I have her green thumb. This was a wonderful and sentimental find!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Adorable but 1 bulb arrived broken. Too late for return because bought for a Christmas gift early in the fall and just now opened and saw that it was cracked!!!!!
